channel.title: NK shouldnt be able to become king
channel.description: It goes against the nature of neutral killers when say, for example, a reaper outs himself and automatically gets the throne as a confirmed neutral. They are confirmed because no one would announce reaper, because if they werent voted they'd be instantly lynched. They dont get lynched tho because it'd just be easier to just make him king rather than lynching him and wasting a days lynch. It feels more like a copout when they do this, rather than a nice feature for nk. Remove their ability to become king so games dont just become extremely easy and quick for both bd and the nk.
